title: JetBlue customers can now fly from Boston to this famous beach location
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Flights In celebration of the new route, JetBlue is offering fares as low as $59 one-way between Boston and Daytona Beach.
Daytona Beach in Florida.
flickr / Cactus Forest JetBlue is now flying between Boston and a famous beach in Florida.

bullets: Crime David Antonio Moran, 19, will be charged in Connecticut as a fugitive from justice.

title: Patriots’ TreVeyon Henderson named NFL’s Offensive Rookie of the Month
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots It's the first time a New England player has earned rookie of the month honors since Christian Gonzalez in 2023.
Patriots running back TreVeyon Henderson stiff arms Giants safety Dane Belton during New England's Dec.
1 win over New York.

title: Unknown intruder steals multiple wallets from City Hall offices
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News A man wearing a hat and mask gained access to authorized areas inside City Hall Monday and made off with multiple wallets and credit cards.
Boston City Hall.

title: How a gym near Mass. and Cass is helping people stay sober
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Local News There's no membership or fee.
The only requirement is 48 hours of sobriety, on an honor system.
Eric Henderson chills out at the Phoenix Gym and Community Center in Boston.

title: Feds: ‘Nihilistic Violent Extremist’ threatened to murder minor in Mass.
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime Joseph Pacheco, 23, of Everett, Washington, was also charged for allegedly distributing child pornography and animal crushing videos.
A Washington state man, who allegedly shares goals with Nihilistic Violent Extremists, has been charged with threatening to kill a minor in Massachusetts, among other charges.

Joseph Pacheco, 23, of Everett, Washington, was charged with five counts of transmitting threatening communications in interstate commerce and one count each of knowingly distributing child pornography to a minor and possession and distribution of animal crushing videos, according to the U.
